text: what's up outliers quick market update for you before the surprise live stream 00 P p.m Pacific time we were getting out there and back at it so taking a quick look at the market today it was a little bit of a follow-through day that's mostly what I saw which I thought was kind of interesting but we are still seeing a pretty big Divergence at this point between large cap and small cap so when I look at the q's and I look at spy you can see that they both had really big green today essentially the overwhelming majority of volume is by volume and it's just kind of this almost parabolic recovery up and out whereas when I'm looking at iwm it's still recovering but it's not really moving anywhere near the same degree as where we're at in these others and again like a quick reference for that is take a look at where they're closing in on pre drop from the first and then the second so over the first and the second on spy and q's it's already capturing most of that move back and it's closing in on where it was at on the 1 that is not the case for small caps we're not even halfway I find that really really interesting because the market so far has continued to be what I consider to be fairly erratic and really really sensitive to movements and what's even most interesting still is

text: on the 1 that is not the case for small caps we're not even halfway I find that really really interesting because the market so far has continued to be what I consider to be fairly erratic and really really sensitive to movements and what's even most interesting still is the timing of this has become very curious because the probability of a rate cut if I grab the FED watch tool for us to take a quick look at together the probability of a rate cut still is pegged at essentially 100 so here you go you could take a look here I guess I got to move it over to this side I got to get used to that now I'm so used to being on the other side um but you can see the probability of a rate cut here so if we poke through this quickly we can see if we look at the probabilities here it's now teetering back to a half point cut but it's pegged at at least a quarter point cut if not a half point cut I find that interesting because a big part of this move that we saw here in my opinion was the expectation of a cut but now the expectation of a cut is even higher and we're not making that kind of parabolic shift so that I find to be slightly interesting I don't know if there's necessarily a ton to read into it just yet
